title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Other Fossil Parks
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Other Fossil Parks              Other Fossil Sites        National Park Service Out of 398 parks and monuments managed by the National Park Service, an astonishing 237 contain fossils - nearly 60% of NPS sites! The entire list is available on the NPS's Explore Nature pages. The following are parks that focus largely on fossils.     Agate Fossil Beds National Monument     Badlands National Park     Dinosaur National Monument     Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument     Fossil Butte National Monument  Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument     Petrified Forest National Park
